div.ab:
ثمــن تامّا وافيا وقبض إسحق بن يوسف على
ولا عنا ولا وعد أزقه ولا عذب
ولا مثنويّة ولا إباق ولا كامن
وبرئ إليه من العدل والفزع والحز والأنان ومن
ـرا ذلك وذلك في صفر سنة أحد وسبعين
ومائــى شهد بدير بجميع ما في هذا الكتاب
وشهد محمّد بن عبد اللّه الجهازي وكتب
شهد هرون بن عميّر عميّر بما ما في
هذا الكتاب
وشهد المنيّر بن إبرهيم على جميع ما في هذا الكتاب وكتب بخطّه

*** *** *** ****
ṯaman tāmm:an wāfiy:an wa qabaḍa ʾisḥāqu bnu yūsufa *** **** ʿalà
*** **** wa lā ʿanāʾa wa lā waʿda ʾazaqa hu wa lā ʿaḏba
**** *** wa lā maṯnawiyyaẗa wa lā ʾibāqa wa lā kāmina
*** * wa bariʾa ʾilay hi mina ăl ʿadli wa ăl fazaʿi wa ăl ḥazzi wa ăl ʾanāni wa min
***rʾ ḏālika wa ḏālika fī ṣafar:in sanaẗa ʾaḥad:in wa sabʿīna
wa miʾatay šahida budayr:un bi ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi
wa šahida muḥammadu bnu ʿabdi ăl lāhi ăl ǧahāziyyu wa kataba
šahida harūnu bnu ʿumayr:in ʿumayyira bi mā fī
hāḏā ăl kitābi
wa šahida ăl munayyiru bnu ʾibrāhīma ʿalà ǧamīʿi mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi wa kataba bi ḫaṭṭi hi *

this pri]ce (?) fully and entirely, and Isḥâq b. Yûsuf has taken over .....
..]..... and no trouble and no menace to straiten him and no hindrance
[.........] and no reservation and no escape and no(thing) that is hidden
....] and he released him from any requital, cause of fear, rough speaking or complaint and from
......... and this in Ṣafar of the year two [hun]dred and
seventy one. Budair is witness respecting all that (is contained) in this document.
And Muḥammad b. ʿAbdallâh, the mariner, [is witness] respecting all that (is contained) in this document and he has written (it).
Harûn b. ʿUmair is witness to the tenor of
this document (handmark).
And al-Munayyir b. Ibrahîm is witness respecting all that (is contained) in this document and he has written in his (own) handwriting (handmark).
